page.title: 15Education in Stamford Br.V
page.content: We have Nursery,Play School,Infant and Junior schools. The Seniors are in Pocklington, and a bus takes children to that school each day.A School Day by Kirsty Wensley.I get up at 8.30 am. I arrive at school at 8. 40 am. When I get there I play Marbles until the bell goes at 9.00 am.We have an Assembly,then we work on Maths till break-time.I play with my friend Emily.After break,half the class go swimming while the others work on their Spelling words.Then we change over.At lunch-time I play a game of Polo with my friends.After lunch we work in Reading Groups,have a break at 2.30pm and then have Poetry or Games. In our school we have 281 children.Our teacher's name is Mrs Donnan and our Headmaster is called Mr Farmer.They both live in the village.Children from the Cattons get a taxi to school.
